subject: Testing certain types of methods
msgSnippet: Hi I m a little confused on how to test certain types of methods. Is JUnit supposed to be able to test all types of methods. For example how do you test a: 1)
messageBody:
Hi

I'm a little confused on how to test certain types of methods.
Is JUnit supposed to be able to test all types of methods.

For example how do you test a:
1) Method that only modifies private fields and has no corresponding
getter method to see if the field is now at the correct value
2) Methods that work on network traffic, ex counting all TCP packets
that I receive. I would need an isolated environment and would need to
be able to send X amount of packets to my machine.

Thanks in advance
Pico
